title: Looking To Level Accounts With Someone
body:
Hey looking to level accounts with anyone just add me on
Mennea 
Gps 
or message me here would be much appreciated 
Good luck on the rift 
just looking to have people who have alts willing to smurf or alt 
Thanks Hope to see you soon {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Added you in game on this account.
hey man can you add me? IGN Yendaxio
